fields.label: General info
fields.message:
Shortcodes

  • [button] your anchor [/button] - Wrap any link in the content to give it a button like style
  • [subpages] - List all subpages of current parent page (applicable on sub-pages as well)
  • [people type=""] - Shortcode to print out People grid, with filter 'type' which can have values 'board' or 'headquarters' to show respective category
  • [partners] - This shortcode will print all partners
  • [stories] - This shortcode will print 3 lates posts

fields.label: Block specification
fields.message:
Modules

Module types:

  • Page Hero
  • Slider - Default
  • Slider - Extended
  • Image Heading
  • Dark Wrapper
  • Custom Video
  • Columns
  • Image
  • Paragraphs
  • Headings
  • Lists
  • Native Video
  • Buttons
  • Shortcodes
  • Media + Text

Additional classes for blocks:

  • boxed - Custom Heading Additional CSS class that displays boxed heading.
  • smaller-hero - It changes the height of the hero section to the 800px.
  • heading-alone - Alines heading left.
  • narrow - Width of the boxed heading is smaller.
  • wide - Element (heading, image) has larger preview on desktop screens.
  • image-top-offset - Custom image block position in Dark wrapper / Media & Text Additional CSS class. Moves text from the top towards the middle of the element.
  • offset-bottom - Moves text from the bottom towards the middle of the element.
  • moved-left - Moves element in block to the left.
  • top-left - Moves text to the left top of the element.
  • right-moved - Moves title to the right of the element.
  • space-top - Adds 100px top padding to the element.
  • pull-top - Displays Image heading on the top of the element.
  • mt-240 - Adds 240px top margin to the element.
  • mb-0 - Margin-bottom of the element is 0px.
  • tablet-wrap - It wraps block elements on table.
  • mobile-large - Image has larger preview on mobile devices.
  • caps - Displays uppercase letters of the title.
  • line - Displays vertical line before the heading.
  • alt-bgr - Displays the background image on top of the element.
  • no-effects - It switches off grey overlay over the element (map image).

[Module] - Page Hero

Features:

  • Hero content - Short title in H6 tag, main title in H1 tag and bolded description text in paragraph with tag.
  • Hero type - Check option to have background image in hero section.
  • Hero background image - Displays image in hero section on the page.

[Module] - Slider - Default

Features:

  • Slider type - Default - Displays images in slider section on the page.

[Module] - Slider - Extended

Features:

  • Slider type - Extended - Displays images in slider section on the page.
  • Slider content - Displays content field in slider section on the page.

[Module] - Image Heading

Features:

A custom background image heading block.

[Module] - Dark Wrapper

Features:

A custom dark content block.

  • Block background - Displays image as a background image.
  • Block background position - Top radio button is selected - image is displayed on top of the section. Bottom radio button is selected - image is displayed on bottom of the section.

[Module] - Custom Video

Features:

  • Video File - Adding the Video file.
  • Poster Image - Featured image for the Video file.
  • Video Captione - Caption text below the video.
  • External video embed code - The field where embedded code needs to be added.
  • External video platform - Select YouTube or Vimeo radio button to select the source of the embedded code.

[WP blocks] - Columns

Features:

A block that displays content in multiple columns, then add whatever content blocks youâ€™d like.

  • Columns - With slider choose the number of the columns.
  • Column - A single column within a columns block.

[WP blocks] - Image

Features:

Insert an image to make a visual statement.

[WP blocks] - Paragraphs

Features:

Start with the building block of all narrative.

[WP blocks] - Headings

Features:

Introduce new sections and organize content to help visitors (and search engines) understand the structure of your content. In this module you can add title in H tags (H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6)!

[WP blocks] - Lists

Features:

Create a bulleted or numbered list.

[WP blocks] - Native Video

Features:

Embed a video from your media library or upload a new one.

  • Video - Upload a video file, pick one from your media library, or add one with a URL.

[WP blocks] - Buttons

Features:

Take action with a group of button-style links.

  • Transform to variation dropdown menu - If Horizontal is selected - button is shown in a row. If Vertical is selected - button is shown in a column.

[WP blocks] - Shortcodes

Features:

Insert additional custom elements with a WordPress shortcode.

[WP blocks] - Media + Text

Features:

Set media and words side-by-side for a richer layout.
